title: Paul Winter - Canyon Lullaby[FLAC - LOSSLESS]
description:
FLAC Files + CUE sheet + Covers
Released in 1997.




Track Listing:
01. Canyon lullaby
02. First light
03. Honoring Song
04. Canyon chaconne
05. Dream of the basketmaker
06. Air for Keetu
07. Cornmeal medicine wheel
08. Redbud Siesta
09. Lizard lounge
10. Hummingbird&#039;s ballad
11. Afternoon sun
12. Waltz of the ravens
13. Lullaby at Pumpkin Springs
14. Dreamcatcher
15. Mars on the Rim
16. Midnight Blue
17. Moon Shadows
18. Music Temple
19. Rain Blessing
20. Sweet dreams, little one
21. Canyon chaconne reprise.


CANYON LULLABY is Paul Winter&#039;s long-awaited first solo sax album, and the first Surround Sound album recorded in the Wilderness. Lyrical and haunting, this album showcases Winter&#039;s soulful and soaring sax within the extraordinary acoustics of the Grand Canyon, among a symphony of wildlife voices.
Continuing Winter&#039;s legacy of state-of-the-art outdoor recordings, and further refining his musical-ecological vision, CANYON LULLABY is a tender lovesong to one of the most dramatic yet intimate landscapes on Earth.

(Description from Amazon.com)


Enjoy!
